content.detailedDescription:
Disc shaped object seen sw of location, orange lights across front with red lights flashing from east to west.  fireball visible sw of location.  strange noises heard in house. possible abduction, fighting 'demons' all night and woke with unexplained abrasion on right knee.  fireball was also seen around 8 pm on oct. 18th by homeowner, and both houseguests.  on oct 23rd neighbor 1/2 mile east: husband dreamed wife went to outer space for a week and didn't leave him any clean underwear. our location is longitude 104.2 latitude 36.49.

detail:  homeowner:  fought 'demons' all night, woke with unexplained abrasion on right knee.

houseguest a: heard unusual noise around 8:45 pm, unable to describe it.  heard her name called.

houseguest b: around 8:45 pm took dog outside, and saw fireball in the sky to the sw of our location.  at midnight she went outside again and the fireball was still there.  also saw a disk shaped object which was ringed with orange lights, and with a red light rotating around it from left to right.
content.summary: Disc shaped object and fireball, possible abduction.

content.detailedDescription:
Harrisburg, pennsylvania. on the morning of october 20, 2008, i took my dog out at 5am. i immediately noticed a shooting star coming straight down as i walked out of my front door. the sky was clear. the moon was bright. i looked over to my right looking roughly southeast. i noticed a formation of lights. i thought it was a plane at first. it did not move, so i thought it might be a helicopter. however it then changed orientation so that i could clearly see 8 star like lights. there was a center "star" surrounded by 5 others. in between the center and the others darted at least two other red "stars". this lasted approximately ten minutes. during this time i saw at least two more vertical shooting stars. i became a little concerned and went to wake up my wife to show her this formation. in the 2 or 3 short minutes it took my wife to come out the formation disappeared.
 
later in the day i was typing a report on this incident on the computer at work. a coworker asked me what i was typing. i told her she could look but don't repeat what she reads. when she read my report she gasped. she said she had seen the exact same thing 8 months before at 5 in the morning (including the vertical shooting stars).
 
has anyone else seen this before?
content.summary: Formation with a center "star" surround by 5 others and two red stars darting between the others

content.detailedDescription:
(i apologize for my english. i hope it's ok)

we were wachting television (couch towards the window, tv in front of the window). all of a sudden my husband saw a bright orange orb coming over the tree tops. he calls out 'what is that?' and points it out to me. 

we stood up from the couch, and saw the first one to be followed bij 2 or 3 others. we went out to the garden to have a better look. they were bright orange (only from a distance, maybe due to atmospheric interference?), perfect spheres, and most oddly: no sound at all. (i'll include my youtube footage; if you listen closely you can even hear my camera zoom, but nothing from the orbs at all)

they were not flying high at all, app. the same hight as a helicpter.
they were not big at all; maybe 10-15 meters, altough hard to guess with a crystal clear sky. from these guesses could be concluded that they were going at a speed of 150km/h, steadily, but moving not in a tight formation; the moved a bit to and from eachother.
they did not move at wind-direction; west-southwest by east-northeast, making a wide turn to the north.

up close (they went allmost over our garden, so we had a good look at it) they were more yellow, with a deep orange core. radiating from the middle like a fat star.
i drew a picture of what i saw in photoshop: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=ywdircpbizq 
as we stood there my husband said "look; there are a whole bunch more coming!" our original 3 or 4 were now joined by 5 more!
from the garden i rushed back in to get my camera, but we only had our sony t10 (so poor quality, i apologize). i also put that on youtube: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=hipdcelnjhk

i kept filming (with a short pause as they went behind a treetop) untill the were gone over the rooftops of our block. we went inside, a bit stunned, and realized we might see them from upstairs, the streetside of our block. we did not spotted them there at all, maybe because they turned further to the north (along the roofs), maybe they were behind the tree (close to the neighbouring house) that was blocking our sight, maybe they just vanished.

we had no fysical respons to it, but were (understandably) a bit in awe, excited, and did not understand what we saw at all, just that that couldn't have been from earthly origine. we are quite down to earth people i think, haha.

i expected it to be the talk of the day, as they went over a vast populated area. but as we learned: most people kept quiet to not be the town-fool.
almost directly i got online (as soos as five minutes), curious to what it may have been, and thinking there would be people that saw these to here. nothing like that, but these orange orbs seem to be spotted here in holland quite often.
content.summary: App. eight orange orbs flying over -allmost- our garden

content.detailedDescription:
I was, at the time of the sighting, laying down in my backyard to get some sun, i had my head turned to the right when i saw what appeared to be an airplane or some kind of aircraft that had a contrail behind it, when i sat up to look closer it looked like a line moving through the sky very quickly without any apparent sound. i watched the object  move through the sky headed east, it appeared to have an aura around it, at the time the object looked simply like a flying line, the object never changed its angle which was about at 40 degrees, it moved smoothly, the object flew like an airplane only smoother and much much faster i only had sight of the object for about 20 seconds, after a few seconds of staring at it, i pulled out my camera phone (knowing that my phone can take large pictures) so that i could zoom into the spot for myself. a few seconds after i took the picture the object moved east and then moved south, i lost sight of the object as the object flew behind the row of large pine trees, out of my line of sight.

i didn't think much about it until i got home and enlarged the picture to the spot, the line appears to have three or four craft within it. i have posted the picture along with this report. the photo is completely unedited and i ask everyone who reads this to examine the photo. to get a better view save the picture to your pictures within your documents then go to the picture. click actual size, and then zoom into line which is between the large antenna and some telephone/electric line.


i honestly do not know what is in the photo but i can assure you that it is genuine and is not an atmospheric anomaly of any kind.

please email me at ghandivitamine@gmail.Com if you have any comments or questions (in particular the picture) and thank you for reading.
content.summary: 3 disc shaped objects flying in formation at appx 40 degree angle

content.detailedDescription: My mother had told me that she had seen, on mulptiple ocasions, strange activity in the sky at night. our property is far from any major city, so the sky is very starry at night. aproximatley 12:00 am she took me outside so that i could wittness this event for my own eyes.  as best as i can describe of what i saw, is as follows: for a few minutes nothing moved. then i saw what looked like a star moving north, then came to a complete stop. it then proceded to go the exact opposite direction, in which it then stoped again. this time, it began to fly around in circles, and proceded to go south west, then came to a complete halt, then dissapeared. the end
content.summary: many pea sized white star like white objects that move.

content.detailedDescription: (approx.1975-76)it was the summer,i believe it was july,maybe, august.It was a warm evening.The sky was lit full of stars.I was in the park ,with a friend of mine.The park was in front of our house.So,that evening,my friend and i,decided to sit on a park bench(on its back rest)and we proceeded to imitate chickens(there cackling,etc..).We were kids!Anyways,after a few minutes of cackling.I notice this stationary white light ball,in the sky, to my left,at say 70 degree angle to where we were.So,i yell out to my friend,in excitment,"hey,look at that!".We both were glued to this white light ball(that's what it looked like from the ground).The light started to oscillate,it changed colors...Yellow,red,blue( a mix of those colors )they had a neon/irredescent glow to them .I was in a state of awe,mouth wide open,and looking.I believe my friend was in the same state of awe.The object stopped changing colors...Returned to its white color,and proceeded to streak across the sky, above us,it went back and fourth,so fast, it left a light trail.It would go back and fourth,stopping on a dime.Then,it did the same,but,diagonally,still connected to the previous light trail.It did the same thing,went back and fourth,leaving a light trail,and stopping on a dime.My eyes never left the white light ball,same with my friend.The object, continued to complete,what i described to people,as the letter z in the sky.It went so fast,that the first two light trails were still lit up.When the third line(if you will)to the letter " z " it scribed was finished,it stopped on a dime.It stayed stationary for a couple of seconds,then shot up...Straight up,at incredible speed, and disappeared.I right away, broke it down to logic,even at that age.There were no clouds,for image projection.There was no light beam from ground to sky.There was no sound.There was no form to it,other than the white light ball.Nothing could move that fast and stop on a dime.In the 70's people had modest homes,thus,no holographic machines.We ran to my house, told my dad,he said (along these lines)oh that's good.The next day.My friend tells me,that his parents said,"it was a plane!".I said to my friend,there was no noise,there was no clouds for image projection,nobody could afford a holograph machine,that planes could not move like that...Back and forth,and stop on a dime...Etc,etc...Through the years,while telling this story...I had a hair raising moment.When describing the light trail that the object left behind,and the letter it resemmbled to up in the sky, "the letter z".I realized that looking from the ground up...Its the letter " n ",and not the letter "z"(reading it from say, east to west in the sky,stretched out away from you looks like the letter "z",but viewing it, the way the object wrote/scribed it, south to north.,it is the letter "n" in the sky.. understand).If you take the letter "n" and put it above your head, it looks like the letter,that starts my family name.This is my second sighting...From my first to the second,there was wierd things,maybe around 6-7-8 years of age.Things around my bed,short purple or blue hooded and other ones, long stringy,taller.I use to scream my head off,i guess nobody heard.I would wake up the next day and all was forgotten. i will submit my third sighting, shortly.I'm sorry, if all this seems strange,well,imagine seeing these things, and people think your out there.���������������
content.summary: Stationary white light,irredescent colors,back to white,streaked leaving light trail,like letter z in sky,stopped ,shot up strait, incredible speed,disappeared

content.detailedDescription: i am a med nurse in fort erie ,ontario. i got to work at  5;45 this morning , when the laundry girl linda i work with said the object was in the sky.  we have been observing it for some weeks now, we immediately went out side and i recorded it on my cell phone like i have some several times before.  only this time i had at least 5 witnesses, i ve been showing my video for some time but this time i have a clear picture of the moon and cars driving under neath it the lights actually flash in sequence while the objuct sits motionless in the sky.  iam not attaching clips if you want to see the video you come to me. where i know there safe.
content.summary: Its been hanging around for days its 6 or 7 lights white lights with red flashing lights it hovers

content.detailedDescription:
Block looking object was caught from the corner of my eye falling from the sky. the object began to arc to the ground terrain, slowing. i began to see the hull wall structure. multiple, staggered plates lined the perimenter of the ship. the plates were stacked 5 plates high. the hull plates were riveted to the ship. the ship slowed further and crossed my view and the sun began to show on its hull-wall. the hull material was a gold/green/grey and seemed to be metalic, in sheen. the ship was less than 1 mile away at this time and appeared to change direction and came toward me, slowing still. i began to guage the dimensionms of the ship more scrutinously at this time since i had not attempted to get away from it. the hull plates appeared to be 300 feet wide by 500 feet tall and the angle of the ship i was viewing had about 25 plates on its lowest row. it was still comming. the ship was traveling very slowly at this time; apporoximately, .25 miles per second and about 200 feet off of the ground. by this time, the terminator was stepping into the air and it was begining to come down toward the ground at me. i still could not run from it. when it stopped , it was less than 1000 feet away from me, standing there. its hull wall was a silver grey now in the dusk of the terminator. it stood for what seemed to be a few minutes then jumped off at an accelerative velosity i thought i calculated at 3700 miles in that splitting of a second that i thought i could make a somewhat correct judgement of time and distance. it was appearantly never reported, that i could note, but it had stopped over the san jose airport. i still don't know why there was no report when the ship had been down that long and had actually stopped over an airport. this ship seemed to be more than a mile in diameter; i had calculated it to be on the order of 3 miles in diameter.

the attachement is a computer generated rendition of the actual ship. rivets and hull wall structure could not be attempted here. i wish i could have written the program wcich could have assembled it for showing.
content.summary: Block looking object fell from the sky; saucer

content.detailedDescription:
Just before the sun rose from behind the tustin foothills, there was an object just to the north of the sun that was not moving (around the pleasants peak area).  the object appeared to be reflecting the sunlight, which changed in intensity as the sun continued to rise. there were no clouds or aircraft in the area at the time of the observation.  the object was not a planet or a star (verified by astronomical data and object did not travel opposite the rotation of the earth) and it was not an aircraft (verified by air traffic control and no contrails visible).

the object was white in color (reflection from sun), approximately half an inch in size at about a 20 degree angle from the ground, at an arms length using my thumb nail as a gauge. 

as the sun continued to rise, the object did not move. at 8 am, after the sun rose completely, the object could not be seen due to the sun's glare.

the object did not appear to be a sattelite due to its position in the sky and the changes in light intensity when the sun was rising (reflection).

no photos were taken due to the sun's proximity to the object.
content.summary: Stationary object just above mountain range looking east from lax airport

content.detailedDescription: I just got home from work around 7pm.  i was walking through the backyard to let the dog out of the pen.  it had just gotten dark at this time of year.  the lights were very noticable.  they were in a boomerang shape, low to the treeline and making no noise.  the dogs did not even bark which i thought was also odd.  the object hovered and moved at a slow rate of speed.  it returned from the same direction that it came from.  i felt like it was observing me.  this event really scared me and i felt scared for my life.  the object was enormous.  i couldnt see an outline of the object but if the lights were attached to one object then it had to be larger than a football field.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped lights hovering and blinking low to the ground, big

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home playing football in the back garden, afterwards i went to lay down on the grass, as i was relaxing something had caught my eye in the sky. so it got me looking up at sky it was quite clear sunny day with some clouds about, as i was trying to find what got my attention, eventualy i spotted this object by the way it was flashing in and out i guess thats what caught my eye in the beginning. 

it looked to be shiney/metallic object i would estimate the size probaly 10-20ft across and the distance it was at i would say it was about few hundred or several hundred feet up in the sky (hard to estimate its size and distance) but it was in view range. 

anyway this object kept on blinking in and out of sequence, like it was on a timer, it was kind of hard to keep a track of it as it was flashing in and out for every half a second to say about a second i would say. it kept doing this for the majority of the sighting, which lasted for about 10-15mmins.

i thought is this object flashing because the sun was reflecting off it, or is this thing actualy doing it, this object looked to have some sort of controlled appearance to it, like an intelligence, simular to what a satelite does. also what i found strange was the actual object it self, the shape of it was so unusual, it got me thinking is this object only showing a small part of the shape to something which was there. i have no clue what i witnessed but it was nothing i have ever seen before, at the time i was realy baffled and probaly looked to have a confused look on my face(scratching my head sort of thing).  i lost track of the object as i went to go get my binoclures, i came back, and i couldnt find this thing.
content.shape: Cigar,  Cylinder,  Flash,  Square,  Rectagular,  Triangle
content.summary: A shiney metallic longish rectangler/triangler flashing sequence object

content.detailedDescription:
This is a story of a ufo siting that was documented by hundreds of people and was on the 10:00 news. the military claimed they knew nothing about this and despite what some claimed to be fireworks it wasn't. to begin with if it was fire works the news stations that reported it would have said so. they did not and neither did the military further more it only lasted a few minutes and made no noise. what we saw clearly was outside vegas city limits because you could see the airport and clearly see that this thing was a considerable distance beyond that and floating at equal level to the clouds. even though it was clear where we we're their we're clouds of in the distance.

in my oponion you had two choices once you saw what we saw. you either make up some excuse like what one person did and said it was fireworks or you eventually go crazy. if you can't come up with an explanation and you can't deny that you saw it then it would turn your world up side down. everything that you we're taught goes completly out the window. 

you draw two conclusions from this either it came from another solar system or the government isn't telling you the truth that space travel between the stars is very possible and they're doing it at this very moment.

what we saw was very real. the friend that i talked this over with was a fellow cab driver. in vegas it's very hard to get job driving a cab after talking to him we found that we saw the exact same thing how is that possible considering what we saw was impossible. he even saw it from the beginning and i saw it in what i consider the landing mode. it's impossible for me to see things and it's next to impossible for him to see things. we weren't tired or drunk and we're trained observers. this is what i saw.

i was pulling into the show boat hotel. normally i go directly to the cab stand but this time i saw a fellow cab driver looking over his cab like something was wrong. so i decided to stop and ask him if everything was all right.

he said yes but look at that. i looked where he was pointing and saw nothing. then my body completly froze. i thought i saw a shooting star but then i immediately said hey wait a minute a shooting star doesnt go directly up wards. 

what i saw was sparkling crystals in the shape of a star much like a fire works display. they we're about the width of a 747 pair of wings from one end to another. you could see the crystals very clearly even though you we're most likely about 10 miles away. the crystals didn't start from the grown up but started at cloud level. the crystals slowly fizzled away they went straight up for maybe half a mile difficult to judge though from the distance we we're away. when they finally faded an orange ball appeared about the size of a helecopter. 

from this orange ball more crystal lights came out this time they we're bright red. they came straight forward then curved slowly down and when those lights faded another orange ball appeared. so now we have two orange balls about a half mile apart about the size of a helicopter.

then more crystal red light came from the second orange ball and shot straight across forming a perfect triangle.

now you have three orange balls about the size of a helicopter aprox half a mile apart forming what looks like a perfect triangle. then all of a sudden the lower right ball looked like it was beginning to rotate and it just vanished.

what i saw lasted about 2 or 3 minutes the lights that looked like fire works display lasted maybe only seconds. theiir was absolutely no noise that you could here. if it was fire works display like one person stated where was the noise and why did it last only a short time.

when i talked to my fellow cab driver he saw the same thing that i saw to the letter. however he saw the strange lights come down from the stars and that must have looked very strange indeed. he rushed home and reported it to the news and never came back to work. it must have affected him immensely. it didn't start to bother me till i lost my job and had time to think about it.

i know that we don't have anything that can display fireworks from a mile of the ground and that can form a what appears to be a perfect triangle.

most likely the reason why no photographs we're taken is because you had to be looking in the right direction at the right time. the flashes of light probably didn't last that long and when the 3 balls appeared they fairly far of and perhaps most didn't see that aspect of it. also if you did see the lights your body most likely went into a state of shock you wouldn't have had time to get your camera ready.

this was documented on the 10:00 news on i believe to be saturday 13, august 1994.

what's your explanation
content.summary: Huge triangliar shaped object hovered for 5 minutes at least 300 yards on each side.

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday, 10/12/2008 i was enjoying one of the last days of warm weather by lying out in our field, while reading. i looked up and saw an object that was pee sized, at arms length, moving rapidly across the sky in a se to nw direction. there is a woods about 1800 feet from my position. i first spotted the object, just over the woods, at what appeared to be at a high altitude. in a matter of 8-10 seconds this object traversed the sky, disappearing over a woods, opposite from where she first spotted this object. the time was approximately 5:00 pm est. 

would you have any idea what this could have been? and, have you received any other sightings, in this area, during this time frame?
respectfully submitted,

tammy johnson
content.summary: Object traversed the sky, horizon to horizon, in no more than 10 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was on my backyard porch smoking a cigarette approximately 11:30 pm pst when i noticed a bright amber oval shaped boject in the southern sky heading northward at approximately 1000 feet above sea level. the light was constant and did not emit it's light into it's path or to far away from itself. it was completely silent. that was the reason i watched it. because it was silent. i live in the ;anding approach path to san jose international airport and i see planes all the time. every day and i usually only glance at them for a second or two but this night i kept looking because i could not figure out why i felt impelled to watch it. i thought it was strange that it was silent. i then thought maybe it's a helicopter, but where are the flashing lights? there were non. no landing lights or headlights. just it's own amber light and it made no sound whatever. it approached from south to north at 1000 feet and i watched it do that in a straight line for approximately 20 seconds. it seemed to be going slower than an airplane or a helicopter. when it came to the area of our house it made a slow left hand turn and began heading due west and i was staring directly at it and it then simply dissapeared. just gone, just like that. i was excited and told my girlfriend to come running but it was gone and she didn't see it. she believes me though. this is the first time i have seen something like this. nothing in this area moves like that and all the aircraft have landing and directional lights. all of them! except this thing. oh, there were no trees in the way of my view and it was a clear night with no clouds at all. there was no reason for it to dissapear. very strange. now i watch the sky all the time when i can. i know it was something weird because i( see planes and helicopters over here all the time. every few minutes one or the other goes by.
content.summary: Bright amber light fly over

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in a parking lot talking to my friend. behind her in the sky at about the height of the tree line i noticed a bright larger sphere moving toward the earth. it was amber in color. curiously it was going much slower than a meteor. i quickly asked my friend what was this thing. she turned to watch it for a few seconds and then it very oddly turned right and disappeared. later this evening i went into my backyard to star gaze and saw two meteors streaking across the sky. the object i witnessed in the parking lot definitely did not move as these two meteors.
content.summary: Slower than a meteor and larger than venus

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in hillsboro, tx. i may have been going west,and seen what i thought was two yellowish-orange lights blinking and was not sure what it was. then i didn't see it, i thought maybe is was a plane or a radio tower and it was just blocked by some trees. but then it reappeared. as i got closer it looked more like they were two sets of lights maybe 5-6 in a row and they were rotating around an object. it appeared to be rotating from right to left. could not really see the actual object because it was dark, i could only see the lights. i tried to get a picture but it just faded out and i didn't see it again.
content.summary: Rotating yellow/orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I was not in chicago that day but my bf was.  he was going to see his brother's graduation from the navy.  he took a picture of what he thought were two brightly lit clouds on his cell phone.  that is what it looked like to me too but then i looked closer.  there was a darker area of the sky behind the two bright rectangle lights(not clouds).  it was an invisible ufo in the shape of a rectangle/square.  it took up the whole screen of his cell phone( it was his home screen photo).  it looked huge and very low to the ground.  i tried to get him to see what i saw but he has bad i sight.  my mom took a look and could see the shadowy fig. too.  i really wanted to print it but we didn't have the technoogy.  it was the weirdest discovery to find the perfect shot of a rectangle ufo.  i wish i could have printed it.  oh well. just my luck.  i'm a firm beleiver in ufos but my bf isn't.  he thinks i'm crazy but i know an alien ufo when i see one.  i just have this sense.
content.summary: Invisible rectangle ufo sited near navybase in chicago during the day

content.detailedDescription: I , as was my co-worker, were working for the forest service as seasonal fisheries workers. while surveying the headwaters of the east-fork of blacktail creek in the snowcrest mountians, we both saw a metallic sphere sitting above the trees on a little rise. we were working around an hour and a-half east of dillon mt. this area is really remote with large ranches around the actual mountain range. we hardly saw anybody up in the drainage all summer. anyway, we pulled up to a new area to survey (end of a old ranch track) we got out of the truck and geared up and started to move down the rutted track. we got about 30 ft when we both noticed at the same time a mettalic sphere above the trees in front of us. ( around 20 ft diam) my co-worker, she just went o my god and sat down in the trail. it was noiseless and slightly mirrored looking. i rememberd that i had some binos in the truck, turned around, ran to the truck and by the timei had the door opened it was gone. noiselessy. i still wonder about the strange behavior my co-worker displayed. people also talked about black choppers in area.(local bar talk).
content.summary: Surveying streams for forest service, co-worker and i witnessed sphere above trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back porch letting the dog go out for the night as i looked to the southwest above the horizon i saw this strange light stationary and stable about a fist height from the sw horizon) flashing slowly from the left to the right probable saturn shaped. i called my wife kristi to come and see this object and she did and saw the same thing i saw. i rushed back to get the camera and install film and when i got back to the porch it vanished!This direction was toward stephenville texas. my wife said the object seem to like implode on itself and there was a light aircraft moving beyond it. about 3 minutes later 7 military jets circled the area and left to go back to the ne. please contact me so i can meet with an investigator to discuss this phenomenon
content.summary: Orange w/ intermitent lights flashing form left to right

content.detailedDescription: I prefer to remain anonymous at this time, and do not mind being contacted via email. i was driving on the north loop by tractor supply. to me left, high enough to be a plane, i saw yellow lights. the color was yellow the entire time. i saw about 6 lights on this side, it was shaped like a disc. the lights were rotating around the disc. this is what made me think it as not a plane due to the rotation. then no lights. moments later the lights were blinking randomly. the lights then disappeared for good. i notice two other cars pulled over watching as well. it was moving slowly.
content.summary: Yellow lights

content.detailedDescription:
These lights (starting out as 4 and ending up 6) have been moving in figure 8 patterns and coming back together. i called my mother in law in atlanta who was witnessing the same event, as well as my aunt who lives several cities away.

i was inside when my father came in to tell me to come look at these wierd lights, which at first i thought was spotlights until i called my mother in law in the next state who was seeing the same thing.
this along with there not being anything resembling beams going to it got me really confused as to what i was seeing. 
5 minutes into watching this we (my fiance and i) heard what sounded like jets coming and going into no specific direction in the sky.
after about 20 minutes it was gone.

i have tried calling several other websites where i was met with very rude people telling me that i was giving a prank call. (thanks nuforc, you jerks)

there are several helicopters circling around, this is just to weird.

i couldn't take pictures or video because all i have is a very cheap cell that takes crappy pictures, sorry.

if anyone here at the website needs more info then call the # i left, there are about 8 witnesses.

zip codes here are 35904 in gadsden al. and 30342 in atlanta ga
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 to 6 lights in differing patterns rotating and radiating outwards coming and coming back together

content.detailedDescription:
I am driving to work heading west on route 38 and industrial park rd. and noticed this bright cigar shape moving across the sky from north to southwest.
 as i followed it, it was moving very fast across the sky, it was not an airplane,it was low enough that i could see it was not. 
very bright silver, no lights visable.
 as i followed it all of a sudden as it moved for only 25 or 30 seconds in the sky, it was gone just as fast as it appeared. it did not change any directions, just a straight line from north to southwest and then gone. no clouds for it to go into. as i drove i kept looking into the same direction to see if it would appear again possibly further in the sky but it did not reappear. 
what made me notice the object was that it was very bright. caught my eyes.

my heart pounded very quickly once i realized it was not an airplane.
content.summary: Fast moving object accross sky, going faster than a plane and disappeared at once.

content.detailedDescription: I don't know the date,nor the time, since i was very little(3,4,5 years old).I was in the backyard with my mom,playing on the swing set.After playing, i assume, we were on our way into the house.We live in an area were the houses are pretty much the same designs(bungalows),when to our left, above the house roof tops(maybe 20-30ft),there appears a blimp like object.This object had people sitting on top of it(they waved to us,myself and my mom).These people(as best i could describe it)looked like pirates/gypsies.There were others,in,what looked like,a basket like compartment.The blimp,if you will,looked like a boat.There were others moving around on top the blimp like object.The clothing they wore was,similar to frilly/puffy shirts,abd black pants,and black shoes.After they waved to us, they/it just disappeared.This took very little time,now that i think back.This was my first,say,sighting...Since then,wierd stuff,when i was maybe,6-7-8 years old.Another sighting, when i was in my early teens,yet another sighting in the early 90s,and some wierd stuff pertaining to "place bonaventure ufo, in montreal.My last sighting was in the month of july,either the 2,3,4 in the year 2007 .That one was cool...They all were!������
content.summary: 3 or 4 yearsold, in backyard with mom. over bungalow rooftop apears blimp like object with sailor garbbed people sitting atop,while others inside a compartment,underneeth blimp,looked as though a boat. it appeared, and i, waved, they waved and they left

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 10:45 pm i had just left my home heading out to pickup my son from a church event. as i was driving i looked out my side window, looking towards the east. i saw what looked to be a bright missle like object streak up and towards the west. i hit the breaks on the car and watched. the missle like object was leaving a bright trail (orange/gold in color). the trail was long, from the point that i first saw it, just above the horizon, and followed the object until it disappeared. this lasted approximately 4 seconds. when the objet disappeared immediately so did the trail.
it traveled in a straight line going upwards in a slight angle heading west. 
my first thought was that this was a missle, since i had seen similar when i was in the military, but the trail on this was nothing i have ever seen from any missle being fired. also there was no sound associated with this object. if a missle, i should have heard a rapport. the object looked like it came from the ground but i cannot be sure of that. due to the size of the trail (about 1/4" wide from my viewing point, it seemed to be fairly close.
content.summary: Missle like object leaving long trail

content.detailedDescription: This is the second time i have seen this exact same object, at the aprx same time of morning 0430 hrs today....And heading in the same direction which is from south to north. i was standing on my front deck and just happened to look up and saw the object for a second or so,lost sight of it quickly, it moves fast and went behind the tree line, i did not have time to find a spot that i could see it again...It is almost rectangular in shape however the back end flares out on each side. wings ?...The object completely is fiery color bright, doesn't change stays the same...And the speed is phenomenal,faster then a jet..It did not change flight pattern just went straight to the north. the object must be huge, from where i was standing on my front deck it was the size of an apricot pit, imagine how big it really is that far up, which is as high as an air liner would fly. the first sighting which i reported to you was on august 28th, 08 at 0400 hrs. again i was out on my front deck but in a better location when i just happened to look up and saw it... it went in the same direction then too, from the south to the north...In this spot i could see it better and was able to see it's shape.
content.summary: Another sighting of the same type ufo, fiery object, sme path, s-n

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my garage at the night sky as i only smoke my cigarettes in our garage and seen what appeared to be a firework of some sort, i thought this one will fizzle, but it continued to move,made a sizzle sound but yet continued to move west towards cincinnati from amelia east fork area, as i stood up and got a better look it appeared to be a size of a small rocket on fire but yet still moving. as in a searing repetition, like it was getting stuck? i called out oh my god! what is that! watched til it disappeared quickly. i ran inside and told my son and husband hoping they wouldn't think i have lost my mind.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: Moved upwards at an angle heading west

content.detailedDescription:
A few nights ago i noticed an object above the tree line flashing red, green, and bright strobe white color.  it hovered for quite some time not moving at all.  my father came over and confirmed this as well.  then we say planes and helicopters, and the object was gone.

last night a friend was over and i picked her up in a town over.  on the way to my house we noticed these objects all over the place.  when we go to my house we went outside to look.  i live on a lake.  

we saw many of these objects flashing in and out.  then one came closer , hovered above the water and gave a light show.  the colors were intense.  i can only describe it as bright white light, sporadically chanigne green, blue, maybe some orange.  it threw off colors, like a sparkler.  it was amazing.  

neither of us had a camera, but tonight we will try and film it.  neither of us felt fear, we were both really excited.  it was like a tingly peacefull feeling.  amazing is all i can say.

this one object which gave the light show, did it then dissappeared behind trees, then cam out and did a light show again.  sometimes these would completely dissapear and then re-apper.
content.summary: Multiple ufos flashing in and out then one larger one flashing bright white green blue.

content.detailedDescription:
I just wanted to pass along a "light" type sighting
from central/southwest virginia, usa tonight - so
that in case any other reports that are related to 
this from other locations can be consolidated, compared,
etc.  (i for one would love to know someone else can 
confirm this - even if it was something mundane like a 
rocket or something!)

it was near about 8pm tonight (10/22/08), facing west to
southwest direction.

it was a large primarily whitish-amberish light sphere 
that was far up and off in the sky and was much larger
and brighter than venus, about 2x.  it was very bright
and which is what caught my attention.  

i thought at first it was an airplane - like when they 
come in for a landing with its front beams on.  however 
the airport was in a different direction - so then i 
thought it has to be venus.  i found some other constellations
then found venus and then thought - there's nothing else
except a comet?  it would be like holmes17 (ie: no visible
tail) - except it was much brighter.

there were occasionally various wisps and shapes of light 
that would morph from the standard overall round light sphere 
shape. 

from my position, the time it was visible and the distance it 
covered, i'd imagine it was visible in far western va and into 
tn or ky too.

it was mostly stationary and the movement was primarily subtle 
and slow, i'd gauge about 6 inches per minute - visually across 
the sky.  (ie: pick a spot on the sky hold your arm and hand out 
to mark it with your finger - then measure about 6" from your 
pointing finger away from the original spot)

at one point it completely faded out, and faded back in 
reappearing about another relative 6" away - but almost instantly.  
this process was repeated intermittently a few times.  

it travelled from high mid sky facing west (about 70 degrees from
horizon) to almost disappearing over the horizon within about a 30 
minute period.

when it began to get nearer to the horizon from my vantage point, the colors began to slowly (yet rapidly enough to notice) fade from whitish-amber to oranges, reds, and randomly between these colors.

i'm hoping there will turn up some other reports and hopefully
footage from others.

i'm going to try and post this on some of the other
ufo sighting reports websites.

i'm currently downloading video footage from my digital
camera.  it was at night w/ a consumer camera - so i'm not 
hopeful... especially after seeing the still image.

i'll attach the untouched still that i took once it was near the
horizon and flashing colors.  of course it's night with no
tripod - so it's the typical snakey/curly light trails pic - ie:
useless.  [descrip: there is grass/field at bottom, then telephone 
pole... and the orangy/reddy light trail thing is what resulted 
from the camera when aimed at the color changing sphere on the 
horizon]

i mainly wanted to log this so when other reports turn up, it will 
be good to have for cross referencing.
content.summary: "light" type sighting in central/southwest va, us - moving west

content.detailedDescription:
I was approaching the on ramp to i-270 (the outer-belt around columbus oh.) i wanted to get onto 270 west bound, but road crews has shut the west bound on ramp down, and i was forced to take the east bound on ramp.  my intention was to simply get on i-270 east bound, then get off and turn around at the next exit. 

as i was going around the on-ramp (facing west) i saw a spherical object with an extremely odd almost white light (i say odd, because the light looked almost like it was reflecting off of itself (don't know if that makes sense or not) streaming upward at about a 45 degree angle, the object was moving at an incredible rate of speed, and was gaining speed, before i had even gone a 10th of a mile the object sped out of sight. 

it wasn't leaving any form on contrail behind it, there was a trail of light behind it, however it was not like the light from a jet engine, it was (and no, i am not a whack job) almost like an animated white light like you would have seen in disneys sorcerers apprentice when mickey cast a spell.  

there was absolutely no noise made by the object (i smoke and had my drivers side window rolled down and heard nothing)  this was almost like looking at a shooting star up close only  it wasn't coming down, it was definitely headed upward, and gaining speed at an incredible rate.

i didn't note the time or anything when i saw it, but was able to tell what time it occurred because i called my brother on my cell phone as soon as i saw it, and told him about it.
content.summary: Witnessed bright ball of light streaking upward into the sky, gaining speed

content.detailedDescription: I wascomming home from work as a assistant manager of freds discount store as i was just outside of town something above some cattle in a field caught my attention it was a bubble like craft moveing slowly across a field over to the left of my car it was distorting the areas as it moved but was almost like it wasnt even there kinda like the alien in the movie preditor it was glass like and i first thought i was picking up a reflection on my side window so i quickly rolled down the window but the object remained i was in traffic but to my knowledge i was the only person whom saw it there were no windows or lights of any kind not even a door it moved slowly across the field started moving kinda eraticacly then went streight up and out of sight like in 2 seconds was out of sight was a clear day not a cloud in the sky i was not on any type drug was not in any type distress and i later went to nursing school and became a nurse i have seen 2 in my lifetime one when i was about 10m but it had lights and was disk like this thing had some type cloaking device that was projecting the stuff behind it to the frount as if it wasnt even there i have tried since 1997 to report this to the military but nobody will return my emails i am not a nut i think that maybe this is why people are not seeing them as much most of them have this new technology and are practally invisable  i saw no people or aliens or anything in or around the craft also i noted that the cattle aprox 75 head continued to graze and didnt look as if they noticed or was aware of the craft i stopped my car in traffic and watched it till it shot streight up and out of sight it didnt affect my car or anyone else in traffic as i could tell and i drove on home trying to figure out what i had seen and as i first saw it i knew that by not making any sound or wind and the speed it went streight up it was not from our world after that i never saw it again nor have i seen anything like it since that day people can believe me or not but the fact remains that either our goverment have some technology we dont know about or we are being visited from somewhere out there and we are getting out advances in technoloogy from out there this is a factual event and i have gained nothing from telling what i saw  but i really did see something that i truly believe is not from our world
content.summary: Bubble like craft 25 ft above  cattle  in  field
